alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 7:26AM EST until November 18 at 2:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST /1 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lake effect snow showers. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern portions of Elkhart, La Porte, and St. Joseph IN Counties. The southern half of these counties will see little to no snow accumulation. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST /1 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow this morning will result in areas of reduced visibility and treacherous travel conditions. Later today, snow will begin to diminish.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
